"Flphere" - A sport where players wear inflatable bubbles and try to throw a ball into each other's bubbles while avoiding getting hit by the other team's ball. The game is played on a large field with obstacles such as walls and ramps. The objective is to score points by getting the ball into the other team's bubble, while preventing your own bubble from being hit.

"Sphere" - A sport where players wear inflatable bubbles and try to score goals by hitting a ball into the other team's goalpost. The game is played on a large field with obstacles such as walls and ramps. The objective is to score points by getting the ball into the other team's goalpost, while preventing your own bubble from being hit.

"Savosphere" - A sport where players wear inflatable bubbles and try to score goals by throwing a ball into the other team's goalpost. The game is played on a large field with obstacles such as walls and ramps. The objective is to score points by getting the ball into the other team's goalpost, while preventing your own bubble from being hit. The game is played in teams of three players, with each team having a goalpost on either end of the field. The game is played in a round-robin format, with each team playing every other team in the league. The team with the most points at the end of the season is declared the champion.
